title: Phishing email targeting finance team
description: A fake invoice email was sent to several members of the finance team pretending to be from a vendor. One employee clicked the link and entered credentials on a fake site.
resolution: Compromised account reset, phishing domain blocked, and user awareness training conducted.

title: Malware infection via USB device
description: An engineer connected a personal USB drive to a workstation on the manufacturing network. Malware was detected by EDR but blocked before execution.
resolution: Device isolated, malware sample analyzed, and removable media policy enforced.

title: Unauthorized database access
description: An external IP attempted multiple login attempts to the HR database. The attacker successfully accessed one account with weak credentials.
resolution: Password reset for all HR accounts, MFA enforced, and IP address blocked.

title: Credential leakage on GitHub
description: A developer accidentally pushed AWS access keys to a public GitHub repository.
resolution: Keys revoked immediately, IAM roles rotated, and pre-commit secret scanning implemented.

title: Unusual outbound traffic detected
description: SOC noticed a large data exfiltration attempt from a workstation to an unknown IP. Investigation found it related to a compromised third-party plugin.
resolution: Connection blocked, plugin removed, and vendor notified.

title: Ransomware in internal server
description: A shared file server was encrypted by ransomware. Backup was available and restored successfully.
resolution: System isolated, ransomware sample analyzed, and patching applied to prevent reoccurrence.

title: Email spoofing of executive identity
description: Attackers spoofed the CEO's email address to trick HR into sending employee data.
resolution: Implemented SPF/DKIM/DMARC, awareness training, and external mail banner policy.

title: Failed login alert spike
description: Splunk detected a spike in failed logins from VPN accounts during non-working hours. Investigation showed a credential stuffing attempt.
resolution: IPs blacklisted, password resets enforced, and added rate-limiting on VPN portal.

title: Suspicious PowerShell execution
description: EDR detected obfuscated PowerShell commands on a developer workstation. Investigation revealed it was a pen test activity.
resolution: Confirmed authorized test, improved tagging of red team activities in SOC alerts.

title: Data loss prevention alert
description: Large file upload to external file-sharing service triggered DLP alert. The user was transferring project data to a personal account.
resolution: User interviewed, data deleted from cloud, and DLP rules updated.
